name: Space and Semantics
short_description:
This sourceforge project provides users with the possibility to perform the experiment described in the article "Closing the Gap between Space and Semantics."

The project files contain:
- A modified D2RQ engine to perform spatial queries
- A Sesame/UseekM Environment
- A SWI Prolog module to test the Space package

Also: Open Street map dataset for Baden-Würtemberg, Partial Linked GeoData Dataset, Ravensburg Good Relation Dataset.

All files are grouped for the relating Experiments.
summary: Closing the gap between Space and Semantics
